titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to honorary South African consulates in the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the Department of State should refuse to approve the opening of honorary South African consulates within the United States; and (2) the Secretary of State should reassess the purpose and need for existing honorary consulates.
